fehd.ADR_EN: SHOP NO. 10, G/F., EMPIRE COURT, NOS. 2-4 HYSAN AVENUE, CAUSEWAY BAY, HONG KONG
fehd.ADR_TC: 香港銅鑼灣希慎道2-4號蟾宮大廈地下10號鋪

geocode_en.formatted_address: Shop 10, G/F, Empire Court, 2-4 Hysan Ave, Causeway Bay, Hong Kong

geocode_tc.formatted_address: Shop 10, G/F, Empire Court, 2-4 Hysan Ave, Causeway Bay, 香港

result.adr_address: Shop 10, G/F, Empire Court, 2-4 Hysan Ave, Causeway Bay, Hong Kong
result.formatted_address: Shop 10, G/F, Empire Court, 2-4 Hysan Ave, Causeway Bay, Hong Kong
result.name: Top Blade Steak Lab

reviews.text:
Very delicious and friendly western cuisine. It's mainly served steak. The environment was excellent an comfortable. All staffs were nice and helpful, they will politely asked customers' needs and refilled fries to us. They also described the steak in detail. We have tried the homemade soup, salad, herbal steak and dessert! The tomato herbal soup was great and healthy; the salad had fresh veggies and yellowish tomatoes with sesame sauce. The medium rare herbal steak was fantastic with soft texture and full of beef taste! Love its simple sauce and sea salt, besides, the whole grilled garlic was soft and lovely taste!
Fries was so crispy and hot with truffle taste. The tomato sauce was added for increasing taste!

Marvellous price to quality ratio. Similar to flat iron in London, it doesn't serve many different types of steak, but instead manage very well on the type they sell. I would recommend the plain flat iron. It is served with unlimited fries by default. If you want some greens, you can add just small amount for salad and soups. It serves as well alcohol and some small Brew House craft beers. For non alcoholics, cool yourself down with a dirty lemonade which is not so dirty.

This steak house has been on my list for a while, not only they have unlimited fries but also opened a second shop in such a short period of time. So I brought along my friends today to try out this restaurant to see if it has lived up the hype! The interior of the place is very casual and definitely great if you’re looking for a dinner place with a group if friends. We ordered a few signature dishes: beef burger with cheese (sides with a delicious and fresh salad), prime flat iron steak (their plating was another spot on!) and another prime steak which was juicy and delicious. We also added a chowder soup, which was rich and with a lot of ingredients inside the soup. The flavor was just right and not too strong like the usual cream soup. Overall, we had a great time and the owner of the shop was also very helper and happy as they kept on serving unlimited fries to each table with a big smile. Hope they continue to succeed as we need more restaurants like this one in Hong Kong!

The steak of this restaurant is really good. Very juicy and soft. It worthy to try at least once. This time I have not tired their signature dish. But I will come again and try it. On the other hand, they provide free french fires and unlimited refill. As it is cooked black truffle, it is very delicious.

Value for money flat iron steak. I tried the USDA Prime 390days grain fed medium rare cooked. It's tender and juicy. And the Chestnut fed pork rack is also great. The unlimited refill french fries is unbeatable, the truffle oil aroma is so rich.

result.vicinity: Empire Court, Shop 10, G/F, 2-4 Hysan Avenue, Causeway Bay

result.formatted_address: Shop 10, G/F, Empire Court, 2-4 Hysan Ave, Causeway Bay, 香港
result.name: Top Blade Steak Lab

reviews.text: 好吃😋

以我對Steak既認知，一直以為只有3個部位係特別好食，
“Tenderloin、Sirloin、Ribeye”，但我咁諗實在太天真啦，
事關係英國早就有研究指出Flat Iron(牛既膊頭位)
係嚴重被低估既牛部位，以軟腍程度只係僅次於
Filet Mignon，呢間本地薑就引入左首間以“Flat Iron Steak”
主理既餐廳，以平價同任食松露薯條做招牌，回頭率
相當高，口碑大爆，對我呢d窮遊L真係一個福利呀！👇
-
📌Additional Treats - (+$48)
♦ Super Food Salad 
▪  Quinoa
▪  Sustainable Tuna
▪  Sweet Potato
▪  Veggie 
▫ 首當其衝當然要嗌少少前菜醒下個胃先啦，
呢到可以加$48就有1個沙律同埋是日餐湯，
沙律就好特別，以藜麥做主角，配搭蕃茄仔、
蔬菜、吞拿魚、醋汁一齊食，味道就非常新鮮啦！
顏色都相當搶眼啦tim！
♦ House Soup 
▪ Tomato Basil Soup 
▫ 主要以新鮮蕃茄打成，味道酸酸甜甜，口感幾rich！
-
📌 Guest Chef’s Flat Iron Steak with new potato - $188
👉餐廳特別邀請外國名廚客席為Flat Iron設計獨門煮法，
今期以紅酒汁慢煮，Staff推薦五成熟就岩岩好，
果然炭香味濃，口感軟腍，肉質鮮嫩無比，
完全唔覺有韌既感覺，外層燒到有少少脆口，
Grill Make亦夠明顯均勻，配埋阿根廷青醬帶出香味，
鍾意原味更出亦可以沾少少旁邊既岩鹽！
-
📌 USDA Prime 390Days Grain Feed Flat Iron - $268
👉第二主角唔可以少谷飼牛啦！同普通草飼牛既分別係
脂肪含量比較高，牛味相對濃郁，口感同油香都比較
出色，Staff推薦Medium Rare就夠哂，搭配秘製醬汁，
加埋炭燒令味道更加突出，肉質好軟腍又多汁，
完全唔覺有筋或有渣，加少少鹽調味就達致完美層次！
-
📌 Really Dirty Lemonade -$70
▪ Dirty Lemonade 
▪ Mizunara Oak Whisky
▫ 將Dirty lemonade加入whisky，攪勻飲落又幾易
入口wor，鍾意酸甜既朋友呢隻cocktail會幾岩你！
-
📌Today’s Dessert - $48
▪ Passion Fruit Mango Tart  
▫ 熱情果本身酸中帶甜，撻皮薄身但鬆化，
滲出牛油香味，唔錯！

Very delicious and friendly western cuisine. It's mainly served steak. The environment was excellent an comfortable. All staffs were nice and helpful, they will politely asked customers' needs and refilled fries to us. They also described the steak in detail. We have tried the homemade soup, salad, herbal steak and dessert! The tomato herbal soup was great and healthy; the salad had fresh veggies and yellowish tomatoes with sesame sauce. The medium rare herbal steak was fantastic with soft texture and full of beef taste! Love its simple sauce and sea salt, besides, the whole grilled garlic was soft and lovely taste!
Fries was so crispy and hot with truffle taste. The tomato sauce was added for increasing taste!

Marvellous price to quality ratio. Similar to flat iron in London, it doesn't serve many different types of steak, but instead manage very well on the type they sell. I would recommend the plain flat iron. It is served with unlimited fries by default. If you want some greens, you can add just small amount for salad and soups. It serves as well alcohol and some small Brew House craft beers. For non alcoholics, cool yourself down with a dirty lemonade which is not so dirty.

This steak house has been on my list for a while, not only they have unlimited fries but also opened a second shop in such a short period of time. So I brought along my friends today to try out this restaurant to see if it has lived up the hype! The interior of the place is very casual and definitely great if you’re looking for a dinner place with a group if friends. We ordered a few signature dishes: beef burger with cheese (sides with a delicious and fresh salad), prime flat iron steak (their plating was another spot on!) and another prime steak which was juicy and delicious. We also added a chowder soup, which was rich and with a lot of ingredients inside the soup. The flavor was just right and not too strong like the usual cream soup. Overall, we had a great time and the owner of the shop was also very helper and happy as they kept on serving unlimited fries to each table with a big smile. Hope they continue to succeed as we need more restaurants like this one in Hong Kong!
